message:
Colorado could soon officially make truckers a part of the fight against human trafficking
Bill would require all Colorado commercial driver’s license candidates to complete a human trafficking awareness course.

data.description: Truckers have long been the eyes and ears of the road, and the industry — as well as Colorado lawmakers — want to officially put that to use as the state ramps up it battles against hum…
data.title: Colorado could soon officially make truckers a part of the fight against human trafficking
